statements: SELECT * FROM delivery_routes
SELECT route_id, package_id, current_location, destination FROM delivery_routes
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE estimated_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY package_id DESC
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE package_id = '456e7890-e12b-45a6-a123-789012345678' ORDER BY estimated_time DESC;
SELECT route_id, current_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE ST_Distance(current_location, destination) < 1000;
SELECT MAX(estimated_time) AS latest_delivery_time FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_id, package_id, ST_AsText(current_location) AS current_location_text, ST_AsText(destination) AS destination_text FROM delivery_routes LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT starting_point, ending_point, route_name FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, ending_point FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT package_name, current_location FROM package_locations;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM package_locations WHERE package_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM package_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70;
SELECT package_name, current_location FROM package_locations ORDER BY package_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM delivery_routes WHERE starting_point = 'City A' AND ending_point = 'City B';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT id, route_name FROM delivery_routes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM package_tracking WHERE tracking_number = 'ABC123';
SELECT package_id, status FROM package_status WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE start_location = 'New York' AND end_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(id) AS max_id FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT package_id, tracking_number FROM package_tracking WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY package_id DESC;
SELECT package_id, status, delivery_time, estimated_time_of_arrival FROM package_status WHERE status = 'In Transit';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT package_name, package_status FROM packages WHERE package_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM package_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE end_location = 'New York';
SELECT package_id, package_name, package_status FROM packages WHERE package_status = 'Delivered' AND package_name LIKE '%Express%';
SELECT * FROM package_locations WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp < '2022-06-30 23:59:59' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, vehicle_type FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type IN ('Truck', 'Van') ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT personnel_name, vehicle_number FROM delivery_personnel;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type, capacity_kg FROM delivery_vehicles;
SELECT package_id, current_location, delivery_status FROM package_status;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY start_location DESC;
SELECT package_id, current_location, delivery_status FROM package_status WHERE delivery_status = 'In Transit';
SELECT package_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM package_tracking WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT personnel_id, personnel_name, vehicle_number, contact_number FROM delivery_personnel WHERE vehicle_number LIKE '%ABC%';
